users.about: Dr. Douglas A. MacDonald is an Associate Professor of Psychology at the University of Detroit Mercy located in Detroit, Michigan, USA. He is an active researcher with a program of research focused on the measurement of spirituality and associated concepts and the investigation of their relations to physical, psychological, and social functioning. He is creator of the Expressions of Spirituality Inventory (ESI and ESI-R) and serves in an editorial capacity for a number of academic journals.
users.name: macdonaldresearch

description: This organization was founded and is administered by Dr. Douglas A. MacDonald. Datasets that are on this site are or were used in published research by MacDonald and are made available here so that interested researchers have the opportunity for reanalysis.
name: macdonald-research
title: MacDonald Research
